amendment.description: An amendment numbered 8 printed in Part D of House Report 118-216 to eliminate funding to the United States Institute of Peace.
amendment.purpose: Amendment sought to reduce funding for the United States Institute of Peace by $38,634,000, and apply the savings to the Spending Reduction Account.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Crane amendment (A002) Failed by recorded vote: 134 - 298 (Roll no. 462).

action.text: House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Crane amendment (A002) Failed by recorded vote: 134 - 298 (Roll no. 462).
Roll call votes on amendments in House
